content.rendered:
LEOPARD PRINT TREND

Leopard print trend never seems to go too far away. I think this trend is always a classic no matter the season like a good pair of classic denim jeans. If you want to try incorporating this trend into your look but scared of prints I recommend adding leopard print in your accessories and shoes. Alexander Wang just came out with a new collection with tons of beautiful leopard print bags that have a very modern feel, with half black and half leopard print style. 

All accessories including the leopard print boots are from Alexander Wang fwrd.com Both Look 1 and Look 2 are also Alexander Wang from fwrd.com The classic pumps are Louboutin from nordstrom.com 

Try this look out during Summer and Fall!

LOVE DIONNE
